feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: In a conversation on November 14, 2013, Mark Friedenbach and Jeff Garzik were discussing a "key id" when Friedenbach thanked someone named "sipa." Garzik responded with agreement, calling the comment "short and accurate." Garzik is identified as a Senior Software Engineer and open source evangelist at BitPay, Inc., a company that specializes in blockchain payments.
